@Service public class WorkerAuthServiceImpl extends Object implements WorkerAuthService

      public LoginOutput login (String username, String password) throws WrongPasswordException, WorkerNotFoundException
      Login a Worker
      Specified by:
      login in interface WorkerAuthService
      Parameters:
      username - username of Worker
      password - password of Worker
      Returns:
      LoginOutput with JWTSet of Worker

      WrongPasswordException - if password is wrong
